traffic lights.description: Green light visible at the traffic signal ahead, positioned on the right side of the road
traffic lights.explanation: Indicates that the ego car has the right of way to proceed through the intersection.

traffic cones.description: A set of yellow and black traffic cones placed in front of the green light, blocking the lane directly ahead
traffic cones.explanation: Suggests there is a road closure or obstacle ahead, necessitating a lane change or detour by the ego car.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, a green light is visible at the traffic signal ahead, positioned on the right side of the road. This indicates that the ego car has the right of way to proceed through the intersection. Additionally, there is a set of yellow and black traffic cones placed in front of the green light, blocking the lane directly ahead. This suggests there is a road closure or obstacle ahead, necessitating a lane change or detour by the ego car.

1.description and explanation: This object is a traffic light displaying a red signal. Traffic lights are critical in controlling vehicle flow at intersections, ensuring that traffic moves safely and efficiently. A red light instructs drivers to stop at the intersection and wait until the light turns green before proceeding. This function significantly impacts the future driving behavior of the ego car, as it must halt and wait for the light to change to continue its journey safely.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should prepare to change lanes to the left or right to avoid the blocked lane indicated by the traffic cones while adhering to the green light signal to safely proceed through the intersection.
